item.title: Breaking: San Antonio Mall Shooting: One Dead, Six Wounded, Armed Citizen Shot Murderer
item.description: A Good Samaritan was shot and killed and three shot in a “robbery gone very wrong” at Rolling Oaks Mall in San Antonio, Texas Sunday afternoon about 3:30 p.m. Two others transported to hospitals with other medical conditions. One suspect is still at large and assumed armed and dangerous. The dead man was a shopper who attempted to stop two robbers after they robbed a Kay Jewelers store in the mall.
